title: How to Make Lime Twists

steps.headline: Wash the lime to clean it.
steps.description: Since the peel will come into contact with the food or drink, it needs to be cleaned. Wipe dry with a kitchen towel.

steps.headline: Place the lime on the wooden cutting board.
Cut a thin slice through the lime.
steps.description: Cut as many thin slices as you'll need to use for garnish or decoration.

steps.headline: Place the slice flat on the cutting board.
steps.description: Using the knife, make a small cut halfway through the lime slice.

steps.headline: Pick up the cut lime slice.
steps.description: Twist the two sides of the cut (slit) in opposite directions. Then fold around. The lime slice is now a lime twist and is ready to use as a garnish.

steps.headline: Repeat with the remaining lime slices.
